de.tum.in.tumcampus.fragments

Class OpeningHoursDetailFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • de.tum.in.tumcampus.fragments.OpeningHoursDetailFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.widget.SimpleCursorAdapter.ViewBinder

    public class OpeningHoursDetailFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements android.widget.SimpleCursorAdapter.ViewBinder
    A fragment representing a single Item detail screen. This fragment is either contained in a OpeningHoursListActivity in two-pane mode (on tablets) or a OpeningHoursDetailActivity on handsets. NEEDS: ARG_ITEM_ID and ARG_ITEM_CONTENT set in arguments
